docs.snippet: The Yankees have missed the playoffs the last two years, but for the second straight they will add four plaques to Monument Park in celebration of better days....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees have missed the playoffs the last two years, but for the second straight they will add four plaques to Monument Park in celebration of better days.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir Sports Business column notes that New York Yankees have been honoring more former players than usual with plaques and retirement of numbers as way to keep fans interested during unsuccessful seasons.

headline.seo: During Dry Spell, Yankees Emphasize Monument Park

docs.snippet: Several betting markets publicly list Oscar odds, and their record over the past decade is remarkably good....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several betting markets publicly list Oscar odds, and their record over the past decade is remarkably good.
docs.abstract: The Upshot; accuracy of online betting markets' odds regarding Academy Award nominations offers better picture of what Hollywood insiders have always known, namely the likely winners in each category; difference between popular opinion of Oscar favorites and those of betting markets highlights predictive advantages of asking people to put financial stake in their predictions.

headline.main: Before Oscar Night, Playing the Odds With a Bettor’s Mind-Set
headline.print_headline: Playing the Odds Before Oscar Night

docs.snippet: No measure since King Salman ascended the throne has caused as much buzz as the post-coronation giveaway that will cost an estimated $32 billion....
docs.lead_paragraph: No measure since King Salman ascended the throne has caused as much buzz as the post-coronation giveaway that will cost an estimated $32 billion.
docs.abstract: Saudi Arabian King Salman has ordered over $32 billion in payouts to large portion of population after ascending to throne in January 2015; payouts, symbol of good will, come amid drop in oil prices and are projected to increase government's deficit to record $44.5 billion in 2015, which new spending might bump up to $67.2 billion, or 9 percent of Saudi gross domestic product.

headline.main: Saudi King Unleashes a Torrent of Money as Bonuses Flow to the Masses
headline.print_headline: Saudi King Unleashes a Torrent as Bonuses Flow to the Masses
